item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Warren Zevon
Elizabeth add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "To be kind, honest and have positive thoughts; to forgive those who harm us and treat everyone as a friend; to help those who are suffering and never to consider ourselves superior to anyone else: even if this advice seems rather simplistic, make the effort of seeing whether by following it you can find greater happiness." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Neil Simon
item.description: "Don't listen to those who say, you are taking too big a chance. Michelangelo would have painted the Sistine floor, and it would surely be rubbed out by today. Most important, don't listen when the little voice of fear inside you rears its ugly head and says "They are all smarter than you out there. They're more talented, they're taller, blonder, prettier, luckier, and they have connections." I firmly believe that if you follow a path that interests you, not to the exclusion of love, sensitivity, and cooperation with others, but with the strength of conviction that you can move others by your own efforts, and do not make success or failure the criteria by which you live, the chances are you'll be a person worthy of your own respects." -- Neil Simon

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Grandma Moses
item.description: "And life is what we make it. Always has been, always will be." -- Grandma Moses

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Harry Truman
item.description: "In reading the lives of great men, I found that the first victory they won was over themselves... self-discipline with all of them came first." -- Harry Truman

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Oscar Wilde
item.description: "To love oneself is the beginning of a lifelong romance." -- Oscar Wilde

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Marcus Aurelius
item.description: "When you arise in the morning think of what a privilege it is to be alive, to think, to enjoy, to love ..." -- Marcus Aurelius

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Robert Frost
item.description: "In three words I can sum up everything I've learned about life: it goes on." -- Robert Frost

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Margaret Thatcher
item.description: "I do not know anyone who has gotten to the top without hard work. That is the recipe. It will not always get you to the top, but it will get you pretty near." -- Margaret Thatcher

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Neil Simon
item.description: "[Y]ou're young. Young takes care of everything." -- Neil Simon

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Remember that sometimes not getting what you want is a wonderful stroke of luck." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Dalai Lama XIV
item.description: "Be kind whenever possible. It is always possible." -- Dalai Lama XIV

item.title: Elizabeth add a quote by Elsie de Wolfe
item.description: "Be pretty if you can, be witty if you must, but be gracious if it kills you." -- Elsie de Wolfe
